code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Budgets(){const[budgets,setBudgets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBudgets=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get('/api/budgets',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setBudgets(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching budgets",error);}};fetchBudgets();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Budgets"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:budgets.map(budget=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[budget.category,": $",budget.targetAmount]},budget.id))})]});}export default Budgets;
